dt-option.name: buttons.dom.buttonLiner
dt-option.summary: Container object for DOM configuration of the buttons element

type.description: Plain object which will can have the properties `tag` and / or `className` set.

dt-option.description:
This is a container object for the following two properties:
* `b-init buttons.dom.buttonLiner.tag` * `b-init buttons.dom.buttonLiner.className`

example.title: DataTables initialisation: Use an `i` tag to line the button element
Instance initialisation: Disable the button liner using `null` as the tag value
